metadata.Plot: Allbreck, Jano and Rosentock are researchers of paranormal phenomena. Commissioner Maza tries to give an explanation to inexplicable events that are occurring in a neighborhood of Buenos Aires. Together they will try to reveal the mystery within the affected houses before the evil destroys the existence of human society as we know it.
metadata.Actors: Maximiliano Ghione, Norberto Gonzalo, Elvira Onetto
